headline: APA Corporation Announces Retirement of Rebecca A. Hoyt as Senior Vice President, Chief Accounting Officer, and Controller, to Be Effective in 2026
summary: On June 17, 2025, Rebecca A. Hoyt, senior vice president, Chief Accounting Officer, and Controller, informed APA Corporation of her intention to retire from the Company. Ms. Hoyt?s retirement is...
